subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Though he led the San Diego Chargers to the best regular-season record (14-2) in the N.F.L. last season, Marty Schottenheimer was fired in part because of his frosty relationship with General Manager A.J. Smith.
snippet: Though he led the San Diego Chargers to the best regular-season record (14-2) in the N.F.L. last season, Marty Schottenheimer was fired in part because of his frosty relationship with General Manager A.J. Smith.
